colorScheme.description: The visual color appearance of the component.

defaultIsChecked.description: If `true`, the radio will be initially checked.

isChecked.description: If `true`, the radio will be checked.

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the form control will be disabled.

isInvalid.description: If `true`, the form control will be invalid.

isReadOnly.description: If `true`, the form control will be readonly.

isRequired.description: If `true`, the form control will be required.

name.description: The name of the input field in a radio.

onChange.description: The callback invoked when the checked state changes.

value.description: The value to be used in the radio button.

name.description: The name of the input field in a radio.

onChange.description: The callback invoked when the checked state changes.

value.description: The value to be used in the radio button.

defaultValue.description: The initial value of the radio group.

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the form control will be disabled.

isInvalid.description: If `true`, the form control will be invalid.

isNative.description:
If `true`, input elements will receive `checked` attribute instead of `isChecked`.

This assumes, you're using native radio inputs.

isReadOnly.description: If `true`, the form control will be readonly.

isRequired.description: If `true`, the form control will be required.

items.description: If provided, generate radios based on items.

name.description: The HTML `name` attribute used for forms.

onChange.description: The callback fired when any children radio is checked or unchecked.

value.description: The value of the radio group.

defaultValue.description: The initial value of the radio group.

id.description:
The top-level id string that will be applied to the radios.
The index of the radio will be appended to this top-level id.

This assumes, you're using native radio inputs.
